title: Impact of increased MSB of a public good

content.question: An increase in the marginal social benefit of consuming a public good should result in

choices.label: a decrease in public production of the good
an increase in the optimal quantity of the good
a decrease in the optimal quantity of the good
a decrease in the social costs associated with producing the good
a decrease in the social costs associated with consuming the good

content.answer: an increase in the optimal quantity of the good

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
